page.title: 03Amenities Ardfern/Craignish
page.content: Most households have a phone & TV (communal aerial installed 9yrs ago) There is a food store, a shop that sells cards & papers and a P.O. A mobile bank weekly,library van each 3 weeks. A coalmerchant, fishmonger & even an enterprising clothier call at regular intervals!The nearest chemist (& Dr's surgery/hospital)15 miles away (medicines by post). Good neighbours are always willing to help.The postman (calling daily at almost every home) acts as a vital link between us all. 1 bus a day (Mon-Sat) L/G/H to Oban (& back) road end (1.5 miles).To Glas- gow (90+ miles)3 weekday buses,4 Sat, 2 Sun, from L/G/H. Trains from Oban (Mon- Sat) 3 a day both ways. (Very re -duced services in Winter/most people consider a car necessary!) Leisure centre(15 miles),watersports (4 miles),riding stable(3),cinema(26).
